Introduction
This topic contains information on the basics of the VA home loan program, including

content required for RLC requests for determinations of eligibility
, and

title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A - Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Home Loan Program
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 7, Section A
